name: Vegan Black Bean and Sweet Potato Salad
author: chefcs
summary: This is a great side dish using fresh ingredients. There are never leftovers!
ingredients: 1 pound sweet potatoes, peeled and cut into 3/4-inch cubes
½ teaspoon ground cumin, or more to taste
coarse salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 (14.5 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained
directions: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C)
Spread sweet potatoes onto a rimmed baking sheet
Drizzle 1 tablespoon olive oil over sweet potatoes; season with cumin, red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper
Toss sweet potatoes until evenly coated
Roast on the lower rack of the preheated oven, stirring halfway through, until sweet potatoes are tender, 25 to 35 minutes
Whisk remaining 2 tablespoons olive oil and lime juice together in a large bowl; season with salt and pepper
Add sweet potatoes, black beans, onion, and cilantro; gently toss to coat
